tool.name: Minfi Get Beta

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE)
MSet <- get(load('$mset'))
beta <- getBeta(MSet)
write.table(beta, file = '$matrix', quote = FALSE, sep = "\t")

param.name: mset
param.label: MethylSet
param.help: This class holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Minfi Get Beta retrive the Beta values (β) to estimate the methylation level using the ratio of intensities between methylated and unmethylated alleles. β are between 0 and 1 with 0 being unmethylated and 1 fully methylated.
**Input information**
Input data is MethylSet class R object holding preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.
**Output information**
Minfi Get Beta outputs an interval file of methylation indices (beta values), which are continuous values between 0 and 1 representing the ratio/fraction of the intensity of the methylated-probe signal to the total signal intensity for each probed CpG site. ============ ============================ ============================ GSM1588704_8795207135_R01C02 GSM1588705_8795207119_R05C02 ------------ ---------------------------- ---------------------------- "cg00050873" 0.909476193629561 0.896490051419629 "cg00212031" 0.209386281588448 0.385553470919325 "cg00213748" 0.628531073446328 0.563679245283019 "cg00214611" 0.233333333333333 0.135280553420446 =======================================================================
